article.title: JQ American Corporation
article.summary: Learn more about JQ American Corporation, one of the Oakland U.S. Export Assistance Center's clients.
article.content:
​

JQ American Corporation, established in April 1998, distributes products manufactured in the United States.

The company is headquartered in Hayward, California and plans to open more offices in the future.

In 2002, the company was the recipient of the Presidential "E" award, the highest honor bestowed by the United States government upon exporting companies for excellence, and has received numerous other awards from federal government agencies.

Services

JQ American specializes in the supply of products and services to Industrial and Oil, Laboratory, Medical, Pharmaceutical and Chemical institutions, both domestic and international.

They are a team of qualified business and service engineers, dedicated to meeting the needs of domain industries, large and small.

Please visit theJQ American websiteto browse through their completely searchable catalog listing over 200,000 products, soon to be increased to more than a million products.

Below is a history of JQ American's history of awards and events with the corresponding photos:

December 2006

Mumbai Business Summit- Oakland Export Assistance Center Director Rod Hirsch accompanied, Jamal Qureshi of JQ American, to the Mumbai Business Summit as part of Under Secretary of Commerce Frank Lavin's trade mission to India.

January 2006

Videoconference with Bhopal- The Oakland U.S. Export Assistance Center arranged for a videoconference with the Bank of Alameda, the U.S. Export-Import Bank, and JQ American to explore financing opportunities for a project in Bhopal, India.

October 2004

Small Business Exporter of the Year- Mr. Jamal Qureshi, President of JQ American, was recognized at the National District Export Council (DEC) conference in Memphis, where Mr. Qureshi was presented with a finalist award as runner-up to the National DEC's Small Business Exporter of the Year.

News/Media

October 2, 2008 -U.S. Commercial Diplomacy at Work: Building Trade Ties with India

November 3, 2006 -Indian deal is big score for growing East Bay firm

July 4, 2003 -Packaging an Image

September 1, 2002 -Government boost lifts JQ American Corp.

June 6, 2002 -Commerce Secretary Evans Honors Businesses for Export Achievements


​
